extendedInfo.description: Pot Farm Moocher Pro is the official companion app for the most popular marijuana game in the world: Pot Farm on Facebook!Discreetly collect your rewards on the go. Whether youâre on the bus, at work, in the bathroom or chillin with ya buds; as long as you have Internet access, you can do it anywhere you like!Now with this groovy app, youâll never miss out on that free Surprise Seed ever again!  FEATURES: â Lurk and mooch from all your Pot Farm buddies in one handy app. â Single tap to claim direct from your news feed.â Official app made by East Side Games, the creators of Pot Farm â Join over 100,000+ active players on Facebookâ Never miss out on claims again, be the first of your friends to put dibs on that Mystery Seed.â Hundreds of 420 friendly reefer strains, puff puff, guano and items to collect to help build your hydroponic contraptions.NOTE: You need to be a Pot Farm player on Facebook and have awesome neighbors otherwise, youâre gonna have a bad time. Not a Pot Farm Facebook player yet? Donât worry, start playing Pot Farm on Facebook here: http://bit.ly/PotFarmFacebookFOR THOSE HAVING ISSUES: Please email us at pfmoocher@eastsidegamestudio.com and weâll help you out. We canât help you if you just leave a negative comment as we have no way to reach you that way. ABOUT POT FARM:Be part of the other "green" movement! With 1,000,000 Facebook likes and counting, Pot Farm is the number one underground farming game on Facebook!Grow all your favorite cash crops like BC Bud, Blueberry, Grandaddy Purple, Sour Diesel and Northern Lights! Or satisfy your munchies with Pizza Flowers, Jellybean Bushes and Bacon Trees!But watch out for the Ranger, he's always looking to seize your farm if your protection drops below zero. With monthly updated themed content, the planting and questing never ends!Cooperate and compete with friends as you strive to grow the biggest and best Pot Farm!Play Pot Farm on your computer today at http://bit.ly/PotFarmFacebookShare the love man!

reviews.title: This is a waste of my time and memory on my phone.
reviews.comment: This app is useless.. No point if i can\'t get the game on my phone...
reviews.author: Jen Moran

reviews.title: Thank You!
reviews.comment: Amazing compliment to help us play the game even when we can\'t be at a PC! Hope to have an actual game version soon that will already allow us to use or collect from items on the farm.. like hydros, repeaters, contraptions, etc. But feed collection is a great start!
reviews.author: Tara Madia

reviews.title: Finally!!!!
reviews.comment: A quick n easy way to claim gifts without having to deal with the rest of the junk that pops up on my Facebook page! Very nice
